thread.title: Rahul Bose's 'Poorna' trailer will make you shoutout for woman power! | Zee News
thread.title_full: Rahul Bose's 'Poorna' trailer will make you shoutout for woman power! | Zee News

title: Rahul Bose's 'Poorna' trailer will make you shoutout for woman power! | Zee News
text:
Rahul Bose's 'Poorna' trailer will make you shoutout for woman power! By Zee Media Bureau | Last Updated: Friday, February 24, 2017 - 17:19 0 Follow @ZeeNews 
New Delhi: Bollywood actor Rahul Bose is back and, this time, he is all set to leave you inspired with his new film. Here, we are talking about 'Poorna'. The trailer was recently released online and it is powerful enough to make you shoutout for woman power. 
Aditi Inamdar, a Telangana girl from an impoverished family, was reportedly chosen after Rahul auditioned 109 girls, including a few tribals to bring Poorna's superhuman feat to screen. 
Interestingly, Rahul has produced, directed and acted in the movie. 
'Poorna' is a biopic on a teenager who became the youngest girl in the world to scale the Mount Everest. It is slated to release on March 31 this year. First Published: Friday, February 24, 2017 - 17:19 More from zeenews
